name: ExchangeRate-API
description: Free currency conversion API for all 160 world currencies. Tens of thousands of developers have picked ExchangeRate-API.com over the last 10 years for its reliable data & exceptional uptime - give it a try!

api_methods.name: Latest Rates
api_methods.description:
This endpoint returns the latest exchange rates for the base currency code you have supplied.

You can view the list of supported currency codes here: [https://www.exchangerate-api.com/docs/supported-currencies](https://www.exchangerate-api.com/docs/supported-currencies)

utterances.utterance: What's the current exchange rate for the Euro?
Can you give me the latest rates for the Japanese Yen?
I'd like to know the exchange rates for the British Pound.
Show me the current exchange rates for the Canadian Dollar.
What are the latest exchange rates for the Australian Dollar?
Get me the current rates for the Swiss Franc.
I'd like to see the latest exchange rates for the Indian Rupee.
Can you provide the current exchange rates for the Chinese Yuan?
What's the exchange rate for the South African Rand today?
Please show me the latest rates for the Brazilian Real.
